a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Two measures of government expenditure as a share of GDP,
This chart shows the relationship between central government expenditure as a share of GDP (WDI data using IMF estimates) and
total government expenditure, also as share of GDP (Mauro et al 2015 using IMF estimates).
Data source: IMF Fiscal Affairs Departmental Data, based on Mauro et al. (2015); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
